author: pierred
msg: Use proper 'catalina' (not tomcat) classes for SERVLET_CLASSPATH and
SERVLET_CLASSLOADER.
jasper now passes the watchdog tests, except for a few exceptions
(which I'll be looking at right away).

author: craigmcc
msg: Oops, forgot to support "sessionCreated()" and "sessionDestroyed()"
application events.  These events are now sent to the registered listeners
that implement HttpSessionListener.

author: craigmcc
msg: Bring forward corrections to the default servlet to fix the following
problems:
* If the request URI specifies a directory but does
not end with a "/", redirect to the same request URI
with a slash.  Otherwise, relative references in the
displayed page do not resolve correctly.
* If there is a welcome file, use a RequestDispatcher
to forward control to it.  Otherwise, the text of an
"index.jsp" page was being displayed, rather than the
page being executed.
Submitted by: Remy Maucherat

author: craigmcc
msg: Bring forward a cosmetic fix to the directory listing output.
Submitted by: Remy Maucherat

author: pierred
msg: targets dist and deploy added so it works with catalina.
